text: Shinkō suru mono-tachi wa,`dōshite 1-shō 〔sūra〕 ga kudatte konai no ka.' To iu. Tokoroga dankotaru 1-shō ga kudasa re, sono Chū de sentō no koto ga nobe rareru to, kokoro ni yamai no yadoru-sha-tachi wa, imanimo shi ni nozomu yōna yowayowashī mabuta de anata o miyou. Wazawaiare (kare-ra wa shinda kata ga ī)
